ygData.subject: Re: Not sure
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmmm, how about joining a guild for legit reasons?  I ve been playing EQ for a little over a week now and I m slowly getting to know a few other players.
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmmm, how about joining a guild for legit reasons? I've been playing EQ
for a little over a week now and I'm slowly getting to know a few other
players. However, most of the time I'm wondering around by myself. I'm a
wood elf ranger, currently level 7 on the Rallos Zek server. I'd like to
join a guild, but I haven't run into anyone else that's in one.

----- Original Message -----
From: Ken Rubenzer <kenr@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 14, 1999 4:58 AM
Subject: [EQCheats] Re: Not sure


> From: Ken Rubenzer <kenr@...>
>
> What a crappy way to make 10 plat. As a guild leader I can say this. If we
> were to give someone 10 plat and they quit, who cares! I am surprised a
> guild would invite someone with selfish motives, but none the less
leeching
> off a guild does not hinder them, they are many people what is 10 plat to
> 30 people? Or 600 plat for that matter (two of my guild members made that
> in 3 days in our cash cow hunting grounds, they were both lev 22-24) Even
> if you suckered a guild out of a lot of money (Say 25 plat at lev 6) it
> will only hurt you. You will be remembered.
>
> I just thought it was funny you using this as a valid tactic. Why stop at
> 10 plat, why not stay a member and get 20 plat, or full banded armor? Hey
> why not just stay a member the whole way through and get the really good
> stuff?
>
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: XxKommiexX@... [SMTP:XxKommiexX@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 13, 1999 11:48 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQCheats] Not sure
>
> From: XxKommiexX@...
>
> Not sure about the sense heading. But at level 6, to make 10 plat quick.
Is
> to join a guild, get high level guild members to give you stuff. Then go
> sell
> and quit guild. How you like that? Bwahahahah!! I am a Dark Elf Cleric,
and
> I
> have about 17 plat in bank. Just from saving. I have basic armor, so do
not
> need anymore for a while, and do not need anything until level 9 and
> spells.
> So I have just been saving and that is what I have so far. Not too hard,
> and
> I am gaining exp along the way. So it is all worth it. Anyone know where I
> could get Fine Steel Weapons, or armor off of monsters?
>
